title: Basics
content: Chapter 1 The Basics Learn the fundamentals of how LToP works.

Lost Tales of Periva What is Lost Tales of Periva? Lost Tales of Periva (LToP) is a rules-light fantasy Role-Playing Game set in the World of Periva campaign setting. LToP is designed to be simple to learn without sacrificing depth of play. LToP can be played without miniatures, battle-mats or other expensive accessories. All you need is this book, a complete set of RPG dice, some pencils and paper, and some friends.
Ready to get started? Let’s go!
